column4: just have a single question, it's about dm-crypt (full disk encryption)
must i install it before ubuntu, or once ubuntu is installed ?
may sound like a noob question ^_^;
full disc encryption is not simple ... you need something to boot from and load keys etc
i found much of "encypt root-fs" howtos
i was just kidding. And ok i'll check this out :)
well ty for the help any way !
you have to install it on a crypted disk ... so dm-crypt while instalation ... debing supports that ... ubuntu ... didnt tryed it ;)
